rows.label: qev087201_MSG0001
rows.name: Someone here to visit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0002
rows.name: Is this about a new mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0003
rows.name: Uh...yeaaah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0004
rows.name:
What's wrong, Commander?
You don't sound like your usual self.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0005
rows.name: If mustache friend have troubles, maybe Tatsu can help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0006
rows.name: R-right...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0007
rows.name: We're alone here, yeah? Just your team?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0008
rows.name: Yes, just who you see here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0009
rows.name: Okay then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0010
rows.name:
This mission is sensitive stuff.
Need-to-know, for-your-ears-only, et cetera, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0011
rows.name: What is it? Did something happen?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0012
rows.name: I won't beat around the bush:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0013
rows.name: Nagi's gone missing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0015
rows.name: It's been six hours since we lost contact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0016
rows.name:
He was out inspecting the Lifehold remains
we found in Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0017
rows.name: Wait a sec, he did NOT go out there alone?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0018
rows.name: He had a team of Harriers escorting him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0019
rows.name:
Their last transmission was "in combat
with the Ganglion," and then...nothin'.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0020
rows.name: Which I'm sure you'll agree does NOT bode well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0021
rows.name:
At the same time, we don't want to jump to any conclusions,
especially ones that could start a panic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev087201_SEL0011
rows.name: Claim that New LA would soon fall into chaos.

rows.label: qev087201_JNK0020
rows.name: Mutiny

rows.label: qev087201_SEL0021
rows.name: Claim that you are the new defense secretary now.

rows.label: qev087201_SEL0021_m
rows.name: Claim that you are the new defense secretary now.

rows.label: qev087201_SEL0021_f
rows.name: Claim that you are the new defense secretary now.

rows.label: qev087201_SEL0030
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev087201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask if he thinks Nagi might be dead.

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0022
rows.name:
It could, yeah.
So much of what we got goin' on depends on him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0023
rows.name: We need to resolve this before anyone finds out he's gone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0024
rows.name: Meh, Tatsu obviously most qualified replacement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0025
rows.name: Would you two kindly shut the HELL UP? This is serious![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0026
rows.name:
What?! Of course not! He's probably just
hunkered down somewhere waiting for backup.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0027
rows.name:
Look, I'll do my best to keep this under wraps
while you check it out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0028
rows.name: But we need you to hurry. Find him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087201_MSG0029
rows.name: Understood. We'll leave right away.[ST:wait ]
